gen:link.msg:message: `SubsidiesProvidedIncludingSubsidyLiabilitiesNotDistributed` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSubsidyLiabilitiesNotDistributedBreakdownFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_SubsidiesProvidedIncludingSubsidyLiabilitiesNotDistributed')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSubsidyLiabilitiesNotDistributedBreakdownFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_SubsidiesProvidedIncludingSubsidyLiabilitiesNotDistributed return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSubsidyLiabilitiesNotDistributedBreakdownFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfSubsidiesProvidedIncludingSubsidyLiabilitiesNotDistributedDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSubsidyLiabilitiesNotDistributedBreakdownFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfSubsidiesProvidedIncludingSubsidyLiabilitiesNotDistributedDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSubsidyLiabilitiesNotDistributedBreakdownFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfSubsidiesProvidedIncludingSubsidyLiabilitiesNotDistributedCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSubsidyLiabilitiesNotDistributedBreakdownFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfSubsidiesProvidedIncludingSubsidyLiabilitiesNotDistributedCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
